CustomField.description: The number of days that this advice was in a status of in fulfilment. Prior to having a status of data gathering, this field will be blank, will then act like a counter while in the status, before settling on a final value when the advice moves out of this status.
CustomField.formula:
IF( ISBLANK(Fulfilment_Complete_Date__c), (5 * ( FLOOR( ( TODAY() - DATE( 1900, 1, 8)) / 7 )) + MIN( 5, MOD( TODAY() - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ))) - (5 * ( FLOOR( ( Meeting_Held_Date__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 8)) / 7 )) + MIN( 5, MOD( Meeting_Held_Date__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ))),
(5 * ( FLOOR( ( Fulfilment_Complete_Date__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 8)) / 7 )) + MIN( 5, MOD( Fulfilment_Complete_Date__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ))) - (5 * ( FLOOR( ( Meeting_Held_Date__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 8)) / 7 )) + MIN( 5, MOD( Meeting_Held_Date__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ))) )
CustomField.label: Days in fulfilment
